# Human-computer interaction with 3d projections {#ch:hci}

Data analysis in VR spaces, so called immerse analytics, is becoming more and more popular, yet with mixed and varied results (@marriott_immersive_2018). The Immerse Analytics group at Monash University have been programming packages in C#, for use with the Unity game engine for such uses (@cordeil_imaxes:_2017, @cordeil_immersive_2019). I will build upon this framework and implement dynamic communication with R scripts to apply touring and other dimensionality reduction methods in Unity.
